name: 孫郁琪
objective: This course focuses primarily on qualitative research design and proposal writing. It also highlights the important connections between design and proposal structure. Aiming at equipping students with the knowledge regarding the logic and coherence of a qualitative study, it helps them learn the components of qualitative research design and the ways in which these relate to one another. Students then, through proposal writing, will learn to communicate and justify their own research design to the audience.
